Name: team_size_limit
Description: A team must have between 3 and 9 members

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The allocated budget for a project cannot exceed the maximum defined budget

Name: sprint_status_must_be_done
Description: Only sprints with status 'done' are considered for velocity calculation

Name: feature_priority_threshold
Description: A feature must have a priority of 3 or higher to be included in a release plan

Name: worker_availability_required
Description: A worker must have an availability of at least 50% to be assigned to a task

Name: task_effort_cap
Description: A single task should not exceed 16 hours of effort

Name: critical_blocker_must_be_resolved
Description: Blockers with the highest severity must be resolved within the current sprint

Name: expert_skill_level_required
Description: Certain tasks require a worker with an 'expert' skill level

Name: product_owner_must_be_assigned
Description: Every project must have exactly one assigned Product Owner

Name: user_story_must_have_points
Description: Every user story selected for a sprint must have story points greater than zero

Name: stakeholder_relevance_check
Description: Only stakeholders with high relevance should be invited to the Sprint Review

Name: project_priority_check
Description: Only projects with 'high' priority should be assigned new teams

Name: task_must_be_in_sprint
Description: A task can only be worked on if it belongs to a user story in the current sprint backlog
